title: Square Zooper for Android™
summary: THIS NEEDS ZOOPER WIDGET PRO TO WORK . This has phone and Watch versions
description: Welcome to Square Zooper. Both Phone and Watch versions are in this package. This is a feature Zooper clock based off of Android™ wear  square watch. If you are interested in Android™ Wear this clock is for you. This clock is featured packed with features like  weather, time, date, battery life, a notification about missed calls and sms, and dynamic wallpaper that changes with the weather.Please enjoy the clocks I have made. I am constantly making adjustments and adding in some Awesomeness to make each clock style and feature packed without taking away from the looks.REQUIREMENTS FOR ANDROID™ WATCH: Android™ Wear device with the Companion App-> http://tinyurl.com/AndroidWearCompanionAppZooper Pro-> http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWidgetProWearable Widgets (to mirror it onto your Wear device)-> http://tinyurl.com/WearableWidgetsHow to install for the watch:1) Install Zooper Pro2) Install Wearable Widgets3) Install  Square Zooper- Watch 4) Within Wearable Widgets, create a 4X3 Zooper Widget and select square for watch.5)Go into Zooper preferences and select standby updates. REQUIREMENTS FOR PHONE:Zooper Widget ProHow to set for just the phone: 1) Install Zooper Pro2) Install Square Zooper- Watch 3) Within Wearable Widgets, create a 4X2 Zooper Widget and select square for phone
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Square Zooper. Both Phone and Watch versions are in this package. This is a feature Zooper clock based off of Android™ wear square watch. If you are interested in Android™ Wear this clock is for you. This clock is featured packed with features like weather, time, date, battery life, a notification about missed calls and sms, and dynamic wallpaper that changes with the weather.
Please enjoy the clocks I have made. I am constantly making adjustments and adding in some Awesomeness to make each clock style and feature packed without taking away from the looks.

REQUIREMENTS FOR ANDROID™ WATCH:
Android™ Wear device with the Companion App-> http://tinyurl.com/AndroidWearCompanionApp
Zooper Pro-> http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWidgetPro
Wearable Widgets (to mirror it onto your Wear device)-> http://tinyurl.com/WearableWidgets

How to install for the watch:
1) Install Zooper Pro
2) Install Wearable Widgets
3) Install Square Zooper- Watch
4) Within Wearable Widgets, create a 4X3 Zooper Widget and select square for watch.
5)Go into Zooper preferences and select standby updates.
REQUIREMENTS FOR PHONE:
Zooper Widget Pro

How to set for just the phone:
1) Install Zooper Pro
2) Install Square Zooper- Watch
3) Within Wearable Widgets, create a 4X2 Zooper Widget and select square for phone
comments: Great widget and support I, too, had trouble installing this on my watch.  I emailed the developer and after several emails he solved my problem quickly and fully.  This widget makes the best watchface on my G Watch.
Zooper widget within wearable widgets keep crashing (when i select square wear zooper)
recentChanges: Welcome to Android Wear Square v5.0!  Added My pipboy3000 to the app
